dashboards.title: Healthcare Dashboard
dashboards.description: Meditech Nexus Hospital – Healthcare Analytics - The Meditech Nexus Hospital Dashboard is a comprehensive Power BI report designed to provide insights into patient management, hospital operations, and service quality. Built on a healthcare dataset, the dashboard enables hospital administrators and staff to monitor key metrics and make data-driven decisions efficiently.

dataset_files.name: Healthcare Dataset
dataset_files.description: This dataset contains detailed hospital patient records, including admission and discharge dates, diagnosis, bed occupancy, tests, doctor details, follow-up dates, feedback, and billing with insurance information.

dashboards.title: PhonePe Dashboard
dashboards.description: The PhonePe Financial Services Dashboard provides a unified view of key services — Insurance, Loans, Money Transfer, Recharge, and Bills.It allows users to track transaction trends over custom date ranges, compare total transactions vs. total amount, and analyze monthly performance.A special focus is placed on monitoring failed payments, helping identify service areas with frequent issues and enabling faster, data-driven responses to improve reliability and customer experience.

dataset_files.name: PhonePe Dataset
dataset_files.description: This dataset captures transactional details of PhonePe’s financial services including insurance, loans, money transfers, recharges, and bill payments, along with payment amounts, dates, and status insights.

dashboards.title: Weather Forecast Dashboard
dashboards.description: This interactive Power BI dashboard delivers a 7-day weather forecast for 13 major Indian cities. It features temperature trends (line chart), rain probability (bar chart), and sunrise/sunset timings. The dashboard also includes KPIs and a donut chart highlighting key metrics like AQI, humidity, wind speed, visibility, pressure, UV index, and precipitation — allowing users to explore and compare city-wise and day-wise weather conditions effectively.

dataset_files.name: Current Weather
dataset_files.description: This is the dataset of Current Weather

dataset_files.name: Weather Forecast Day Wise
dataset_files.description: This is the dataset of Day Wise Weather Forecasting

dataset_files.name: Weather Forecast Hour Wise
dataset_files.description: This is the dataset of Hour Wise Weather Forecasting

dataset_files.name: Master Report
dataset_files.description: This is the master report which include current weather data and weather forecasting data

dashboards.title: Spotify Dashboard
dashboards.description: This Spotify Dashboard offers a complete data-driven view of music trends across songs, artists, and albums. It includes KPIs, interactive charts, and detailed analytics for popularity, duration, and release patterns — all presented through an intuitive, multi-page Power BI interface with an interactive media player for an engaging experience.

dataset_files.name: Spotify Dataset
dataset_files.description: This dataset contains detailed information about Spotify tracks, including song names, artists, album types, popularity scores, durations, release dates, and explicit content flags, used to analyze music trends and performance metrics.

dashboards.title: Amazon Sales Dashboard
dashboards.description: This Power BI dashboard provides a comprehensive analysis of Amazon's sales data, delivering actionable insights into key business areas like order fulfillment, shipping, and category performance. It is designed to enhance decision-making and streamline operations.

dataset_files.name: Amazon Sales Dashboard
dataset_files.description: This dataset contains detailed transactional data of Amazon sales, including product categories, order details, customer information, and revenue metrics across multiple regions.

dashboards.title: Virat Kohli Career Statistics Analysis
dashboards.description: This Power BI dashboard provides an in-depth analysis of the illustrious career of Virat Kohli, one of the greatest cricketers of our era. The dashboard covers key performance metrics, milestones, and trends across different formats of the game (Test, ODI, T20I, and IPL).
